text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day of the tryouts arrives. All the<n>participating
Umamusume busy<n>themselves warming up, hoping to<n>
show their true prowess to<n>prospective trainers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The stands are filled to the brim with<n>their fans and friends
alike, ready to<n>cheer them on. Among them are the<n>
sharp-eyed trainers, eager to scout<n>the next star.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan Fangirl
text_block_list.text: Ryaaan! You've got this in the bag!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan Fanboy
text_block_list.text:
Show 'em what those legs can do!<n>Make them eat your
dust!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Whoa, thanks, guys! Don't worry, I<n>won't let you down!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Wow, someone's as popular as ever.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha... I just go for runs around the<n>school a lot, so I
naturally bump into a<n>lot of people. Never hurts to say hello<n>
to someone you see every day!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, and doing that is what got all<n>these people to come
out for your big<n>day. ♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
It's a bit embarrassing when you put<n>it that way... But I
can't say I don't<n>appreciate it! Better make it worth<n>their
while!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that goes for me too! I won't<n>lose to you! ...Even if
I'm not taking<n>part in the tryouts this time.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, we'll have to save our<n>head-to-head battle for some
other<n>time! Anyway, I better head down to<n>the track. See
you soon, Ines!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Knock 'em dead, Ryan!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
From the stands, I see Mejiro Ryan<n>walk onto the track and
start prepping<n>for the race among the other<n>Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
This is it! How far will my legs take<n>me today? Hehe, I can't
wait!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: What are you laughing about? This isan important race here, whichsome of us are actually takingseriously.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huh? Ah... S-sorry!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: ...Hmph.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Hey... Sorry about her. She's from a<n>pretty famous family,
so she's<n>worried about making them proud.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Making her... family proud...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: And with that, every Umamusume is<n>at the starting gate!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: (Making them proud...)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bam!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Ah, crud!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: What's this?! Mejiro Ryan leaves<n>the gate late!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff! Nngh!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan Fanboy
text_block_list.text: Come on, Ryaaan!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan Fangirl
text_block_list.text: That's it! You can still catch up!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And we've reached the final stretch!<n>Mejiro Ryan has
managed to recover<n>from her delayed start and made it all<n>
the way to second place! Will she<n>make it to first?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Ah, the racer in first is... the one from<n>before...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They're approaching the finish line!<n>Ryan's gaining speed
and catching up<n>fast! Will she make it?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And... It's no use! The front runner<n>crosses the finish line,
with Mejiro<n>Ryan coming in a close second!

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Huh? Hmmm...

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: It's just... something's off about<n>Ryan...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. Her running form was<n>different from usual. It was
missing<n>her usual energy.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Ah, McQueen! I didn't know you<n>were here!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'll be running in the next tryouts, so it<n>is only natural that I
be here to prepare<n>myself. But never mind that...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I think I need to have a talk with Ryan.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: Huh?! W-wait for me! I wanna talk to<n>her too!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As Mejiro McQueen makes her way<n>to Ryan, Ines Fujin
and I trail behind.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Ines, McQueen, and... the trainer<n>from before? What's
going on?

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
That's what we'd like to know!<n>What's wrong, Ryan? That
race<n>wasn't like you at all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: I-I just...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I guess the tryouts weren't as easy<n>as I thought. The rest
of the runners<n>were super serious. I bet they were<n>trying
hard to make a good<n>impression.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Their passion won out in the end. I<n>mean... running's just
another way<n>for me to do what I love—exercise.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
I don't have any big dreams or<n>reasons to run. I'm just...
practicing<n>my hobby.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text:
Wh-why would you say that! You<n>train harder than anybody
I know! No<n>way you're doing all that for a simple<n>hobby.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text:
Ah, what I mean is... I-I was so busy<n>preparing my body, I
forgot to prepare<n>my spirit too. Guess I'll have to work<n>
even harder!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ryan.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: ...Yes, McQueen?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Why did you come to Tracen<n>Academy in the first place?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Wh-why? That's...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
...I'm sorry. Perhaps that was an<n>insensitive question. I shall
be on my<n>way.

text_block_list.name: Ines Fujin
text_block_list.text: What?! McQueen, wait!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: Why... did I come here?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: That really stings coming from you,<n>McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With that, a dejected Mejiro Ryan<n>takes her leave before I
can talk to<n>her.
